Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Alguien sabe algo de esto? :



-          Endemol Argentina is producing an interactive games program for
cellular phones.



06/24/04 (Argentina) Endemol Argentina is producing the first program
completely dedicated to interactive games through cellular phones. The
company will invest $30.000 per month in the production  of this program.
